mapper.select: select taglist_name, tag_index, h.taglist_index from hashtag h left outer join taglist t on h.taglist_index = t.taglist_index where tag_target = #{index} and tag_type = #{type}

choose.when: select ind_index, ind_name from individual i join hashtag h on i.ind_index = h.tag_target where h.tag_type = #{type} and h.taglist_index = (select taglist_index from taglist where taglist_name = #{name});
choose.otherwise: select ent_index, ent_name from enterprise e join hashtag h where h.tag_type = #{type} and h.taglist_index = (select taglist_index from taglist where taglist_name = #{name});

mapper.select: select taglist_name, count(*) cnt from hashtag h left outer join taglist t on h.taglist_index = t.taglist_index group by h.taglist_index
mapper.insert: insert into hashtag(taglist_index, tag_target, tag_type) values(#{taglist_index}, #{tag_target}, #{tag_type})
